item.title: YouTube Video Editor / Motion Designer for Humorous Documentary Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Description:

This is a LONG-TERM position with GREAT benefits such as bonuses and raises based on quality work and performance! You are responsible for creating engaging 8–12-minute videos 1-2 times weekly.

Examples:

Below are links to my competitors' channels for you to refer to that will give you a better understanding of the level of quality we need from you.

ChatHistory
Finaius
CrumbRS
VinceVintage
KiraTV

Responsibilities:

Video Editing:
Create 1-2 engaging and high-quality 8–12-minute videos weekly for YouTube within the humorous scandals, explanatory, and documentary-style niche.

Motion Design:
Incorporate motion graphics and animations to enhance video storytelling and viewer engagement.

Consistency:
Maintain a consistent style and branding across all videos.
Turnaround Time: Deliver completed videos within 48 hours of receiving the script and raw footage.

Collaboration:
Work closely with scriptwriters and other team members to ensure a coherent and engaging final product.

Trend Analysis:
Stay updated with the latest video editing trends and techniques to keep our content fresh and relevant.

Feedback Integration: Be open to feedback and willing to make revisions to improve the quality of the videos.

Requirements:
Proven experience as a video editor, preferably with a focus on YouTube content.

Strong understanding and interest in the humorous scandals, explanatory, and documentary-style niche.
Proficiency in English.

Expertise in professional video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.

Ability to deliver high-quality videos within a 48-hour turnaround time.

Willingness to work long-term and grow within the team.
Familiarity with motion design and animation software such as After Effects.

Compensation: 10 Videos For $300

What We Offer:
Competitive compensation based on experience and quality of work.

Opportunities for professional growth and development within a creative and supportive team.

Flexible working hours and remote work environment.
A chance to contribute to a growing YouTube channel and make a significant impact on our visual identity.

Budget: $300
Posted On: July 01, 2024 12:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Creative Cloud, CapCut, Final Cut Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Creative Cloud, CapCut, Final Cut Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing
Country: Switzerland
click to apply

item.title: Looking for UGC creators with Bulgarian - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking passionate and creative UGC Content Creators who can produce engaging and genuine content for the Bulgarian market. Your task will involve creating high-quality photos and videos that align with our clients' branding and marketing objectives. You will collaborate with our creative and project management teams to understand client requirements and ensure that all content adheres to brand guidelines and quality standards. We value clear expectations and will provide detailed briefs for each project, outlining the specific deliverables required.

Responsibilities include producing UGC that resonates with target audiences, staying current with social media trends, and managing multiple projects simultaneously while meeting deadlines consistently.

Required Skills: You should have proven experience as a content creator with a focus on user-generated content, and a strong portfolio showcasing your ability to produce high-quality photos and videos. Proficiency in content creation tools and software is essential. A deep understanding of social media platforms and trends, combined with a creative mindset and a keen eye for detail and aesthetics, is crucial. Excellent communication and collaboration skills are necessary, as is the ability to work independently and manage your time effectively. Speaking Bulgaria with a deep understanding of the local market and culture is a must.
Ability to edit the produced content in a compelling, interesting and engaging video is an advantage.

Preferred Qualifications: Experience working with eCommerce brands or digital marketing agencies, familiarity with influencer marketing and partnerships, and basic knowledge of content strategy and analytics are highly desirable.

Communication: We prioritize good communication and maintain a supportive and collaborative team environment. We use tools like Slack and Zoom for regular updates and meetings.

Working Style: We offer competitive pay per project, flexible working hours, and remote work. We believe in continuous learning and professional development opportunities, providing a chance to work with a diverse range of clients and industries.

If you are enthusiastic about content creation and eager to make a significant impact, we'd love to hear from you! Please submit your proposal including your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter explaining why you are the perfect fit for this role. Be sure to include examples of your previous UGC work.


Posted On: July 01, 2024 12:17 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Bulgarian, Video Production
Skills: Bulgarian, Video Production
Country: Bulgaria
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Manager - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:
We are seeking a dynamic and creative Social Media Manager to join our team and help us enhance our online presence. As we continue to define our social media strategy, we need someone with experience, creativity, and initiative to manage our social media platforms, create engaging content, and drive audience growth. This role involves close collaboration with our team to schedule, post, and manage various content forms across multiple platforms.

Responsibilities:
Content Creation and Editing:

Utilize Canva to edit images and videos for Instagram and LinkedIn posts. (We provide image and video libraries for backgrounds)
Create Instagram Stories linked to posts.
Write engaging captions for posts, using provided frameworks and Notion databases for reference.
Code and create Form Reels for Instagram.
Content Scheduling and Posting:

Schedule and post content on LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, and our Discord group, including adding music to Instagram posts.
Upload 1-2 videos weekly to YouTube with brief captions.

Email Marketing:

Draft and send 1-2 weekly emails related to social media content, using provided frameworks.

Strategic Planning:

Collaborate weekly with our team to plan and schedule upcoming posts and campaigns.
Assist in planning future webinars and membership/coaching pushes.
Contribute ideas and strategies to improve our social media approach and audience engagement.

Requirements:
Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role.
Proficiency in Canva for image and video editing.
Strong writing skills for creating engaging captions and email content.
Familiarity with social media platforms: Instagram, LinkedIn, Facebook, Discord, and YouTube.
Ability to manage content schedules and adhere to deadlines.
Creative thinking and problem-solving skills.
Experience with Notion and Dropbox is a plus.
Basic understanding of social media analytics and tools to measure performance.

Ideal Candidate:
Brings fresh ideas and innovative approaches to social media strategy.
Can suggest alternative and more efficient ways to handle social media tasks.
Has a proactive attitude and is not afraid to experiment with new content forms and strategies.
Aims to grow our following and audience significantly through creative and engaging content.

Benefits:
Opportunity to shape the social media strategy of a growing business
Collaborative and supportive work environment.
Access to a library of images, videos, and pre-built frameworks to streamline content creation.

Flexible working hours with the potential for remote work.
If you are passionate about social media, have a knack for creative content creation, and are eager to contribute to a dynamic team, we would love to hear from you.
Apply now to help us elevate our social media presence and engage with our audience in meaningful ways.

How to Apply:
Please send your resume or detail your relevant experience, and examples of your work .

We look forward to reviewing your application!

@teknelearn



Posted On: July 01, 2024 12:17 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Management, Instagram, Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram Story
Skills: Social Media Management, Instagram, Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram Story
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Youtube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced Youtube video editor with at least 3 years of experience in video editing. The ideal candidate must be proficient in using Premiere Pro and have sound editing skills. You will be responsible for editing and enhancing our Youtube videos, adding effects, transitions, and audio enhancements to create engaging and professional content. Attention to detail and creativity are essential for this role.

  Skills required:
  - Proficient in Premiere Pro
  - Sound editing skills
  - Strong understanding of video editing techniques
  - Ability to work with tight deadlines
  - Creativity in video editing
  - Attention to detail

Pay: $15 per video
Completion timeframe 3 days
Video style: Long form Youtube travel and lifestyle vlogs

Budget: $15

item.title: Ad Creative Specialist: Full Time Position - Upwork
item.description:
We’re looking to hire an amazing ad creative specialist that can work alongside our media buyers to assist our e-commerce clients with high-performing ads.

The role is a full-time position with an initial 4-week trial period. The trial period is paid.

You'll be a part of an amazing company culture with a sole vision to become the best performance marketing agency in the world and to transform the lives of the clients we serve 🙏

Therefore, we're looking for someone who's confident and has a very solid track record of producing outstanding results for clients.

The person we’re looking for is:
- Fluent in English.
- Open-minded and not afraid of a challenge.
- Someone who wants to grow and evolve within a small and ambitious company.
- Proactive, a self-starter. You come up with ideas and solutions on your own.
- Comfortable taking full responsibility for their work.

The role includes:
- Building out our content creator database
- Scripting/making briefs for content creators
- Work directly with clients on ideas for new creatives
- Work directly with me (Rasmus, the owner) to grow our brand organically

Our clients are e-commerce brands all over the world 🤝

This position is only for you if you're comfortable and well-versed in the creative world and have an open mindset.

You need to be willing to learn along your journey and be able to come up with solutions on your own. We’ll provide you with systems and all the knowledge you need and a great support system.

This role is a full-time position and will require all your attention during your working hours.

We only work with people that are committed entirely to the agency.



Budget: $1,500
Posted On: July 01, 2024 11:59 UTC
Category: Creative Direction
Skills:Instagram, TikTok, Video Editing, Video Editing & Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Marketing Strategy, Content Creation
Skills: Instagram, TikTok, Video Editing, Video Editing & Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Marketing Strategy, Content Creation
Country: Denmark
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor & Post-Production for YouTube & Meta Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for experienced video editors for long-term collaboration, remote work.

You should have a good creative understanding and feeling to deliver high-quality edits, have experience in online ads, commercials, and a very good feeling for animations, cutting and editing videos with focus on attention grabbing yet authentically looking videos.

Experience in ecommerce, YouTube long-form, and VSLs is a plus.

For this role, candidates must be at least fluent in German, with native speakers preferred.

We work with both UGC as well as professional shootings, and create ads for YouTube, Facebook, TikTok and others for well-known ecom and D2C brands in Europe and US.

Please share examples of your best work that you personally worked on as a reference.

item.title: Social Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a reliable and skilled video editor to help us with editing social videos. As our partner, your main responsibility will be to take the provided footage and text and transform them into engaging and visually appealing videos. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of video editing principles and techniques to create captivating social media content. Attention to detail and a keen eye for storytelling are essential. If you have experience in editing social videos and are proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro, we would love to collaborate with you.

- Adobe Premiere Pro

- Attention to detail
- Storytelling
- Creativity

item.description:

item.title: Video Animation Expert Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video animator who can bring our script to life, closely mirroring the dynamic and engaging style found in this video:
Video Animation Reference:
https://youtu.be/MJUqfKr_QRY?list=PLaDcID4s1Krpbn7GmW0S236tyJmOiJMzW&t=1134

Project Details:
Script: Ready to use.
Duration: The final video will be approximately 1 minute and 10 seconds long.
Style: The animation should be vibrant, captivating, and able to retain the viewer's attention from start to finish.

Requirements:
Proven experience in creating high-quality video animations.
Ability to work within the specified time frame and adhere to the script’s guidelines.
A portfolio of previous work that showcases your ability to produce animations similar to the provided reference.

What to Include in Your Proposal:
Start with "jocky"
A brief introduction about yourself and your experience in video animation.
At least 3 samples of your previous work that are similar to the animation style referenced.
Your pricing for a 1-minute and 10-second video animation.
Selection Criteria: Proposals will be evaluated based on the samples' quality and relevance to the requested animation style.

Budget: $30
Posted On: July 01, 2024 11:38 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Advertisement, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Video Commercial, 2D Animation, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Advertisement, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Video Commercial, 2D Animation, Adobe Premiere Pro

item.title: Need Animations for Course Videos - Upwork
item.description:
I have a built and edited course to host on a new platform called The Digital Campus. (www.thedigitalcampus.io)

We are preparing to launch our "launchpad" course for additional fundraising and building our student base.

Two videos are here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1cvDCGTy_x2jg4AkxCihnXphj1kEIWm1d?usp=sharing

these need to have animations to help create a visual explanation of the contents being described. The scripts are also attached with instructions on the kinds of animations I would like to see.

Here are some samples of animations I found cool, but they do not need to be this detailed:
https://www.b2w.tv/blog/best-infographic-videos

Simple animations are fine, I want to keep the budget low to $500 or less.

If we can come to a good price and quality there is opportunities to animate MANY more courses for our other educators who have committed to the platform.

Hourly Range: $19.00-$39.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 11:35 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Animated Explainer, Traditional Animation, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Whiteboard Animation, Motion Graphics
Skills: Animated Explainer, Traditional Animation, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Whiteboard Animation, Motion Graphics
Country: United States
click to apply
